function.name: createAppointment
function.description: Creates an appointment in the calendar if the time slot is available.

dateTimeToCheck.description: The starting date and time of the appointment in ISO 8601 format.

summary.description: A brief summary or title for the appointment.

description.description: A detailed description of the appointment.

location.description: The location of the appointment, can be a physical address or a virtual location.

email.description: The email address of the attendee to be added to the appointment.
